TELL ME IN MY INBOX... BECAUSE ITS A SECRET... THEN REPOST THIS IN YOUR BLOG... YOU MIGHT BE SUPRISED WITH THE RESULTS â€¦

life

no one can go back and make a new beginning but anyone can start today and make a happy ending!!

that was a blog i read yesterday that gave me a kick up the backside lifted me out of misery

i woke this morning feeling quite optimistic and read the blog again and there you go it lifted me again

low and behold along comes another blow and knocks me sidedwards but hey tomorrows a new day and brings a new dawn

but jobless homeless and unloved its a hard task but not impossible

it may be a while before i get to spend any time on here so to any one that visits my page please become a friend of mine i need each and every one of you to pull me through this

see you all real soon

shellytots

x x x

SINGLE

Are you single ??
are you luvvin it ??
if so come join my clan as it for single people that actually enjoy being single lets face it so many people go on about how unhappy they are but we never hear from those that are glad to be single and the benefits of it so come on boys and girls alike join my clan and lets have some fun x x x

happy 2 be single clan

come on every one had five requests to be clan member we need more to make this a place to rocks so come on and join us boys and girls x x x

How to Make a Woman Happy It's not difficult to make a woman happy. A man only needs to be:

1. A friend
2. A companion
3. A lover
4. A brother
5. A father
6. A master
7. A chef
8. An electrician
9. A carpenter
10. A plumber
11. A mechanic
12. A decorator
13. A stylist
14. A sexologist
15. A gynaecologist
16. A psychologist
17. A pest exterminator
18. A psychiatrist
19. A healer
20. A good listener
21. An organizer
22. A good father
23. Very clean
24. Sympathetic

26. Warm

32. Tender

40. Determined

43. Passionate
44. Compassionate

WITHOUT FORGETTING TO:

45. Give her compliments regularly
46. Love shopping
47. Be honest
48. Be very rich
49. Not stress her out
50. Not look at other girls

AND AT THE SAME TIME, YOU MUST ALSO:

51. Give her lots of attention, but expect little yourself
52. Give her lots of time, especially time for herself
53. Give her lots of space, never worrying about where she goes

IT IS VERY IMPORTANT:

54. Never to forget:
* birthdays
* anniversaries
* arrangements she makes

* what she was wearing when you met for the first time

HOW TO MAKE A MAN HAPPY

2. Bring food

The perfect relationship

What is the perfect relationship
is it harmony in the bedroom
is it understanding each other in a way no one else could or would
is it knowing exactly what the other wants or needs
is it being there in their hours of need and vulnerability
is it the difference between best friends and soulmates
could it be that no matter what they say or do you never get annoyed with them
is it a mutual understanding
or is it just something that is so hard to find that when it comes along you dont realise its there until its way too late
